metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26415 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Information about the starred projects for private user profiles was exposed via the GraphQL API starting from 12.2 via the REST API. This affects GitLab >=12.2 to <13.4.7, >=13.5 to <13.5.5, and >=13.6 to <13.6.2.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
